faq_1_desc: Moharik is a way to raise money from a large number of people or individulas to provide the capital needed to get a company or project off the ground. Individuals, charities, or companies can create a campaign for specific causes and anyone can contribute
faq_2: What are the advantages of Moharik?
faq_2_desc: There are many advantages of Moharik; Community building and feedback collection, low overall risk for a potentially high reward, Helps you avoid giving up equity in your company, New opportunities and collaborations.
faq_3: I have a project. How can I apply?
faq_3_desc: Create an account and add your project with all the details included
faq_4_desc: Simply click on get started and fill up the data to register a new account
here_for_help_desc: Still need help? Just click the button below and we'll provide you with personalized support and connect you with one of our Customer Care agents if needed.
